Package org.dkr.graph.algo.community

package org.dkr.graph.algo.community
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    LabelPropagation<K,​VV extends Comparable<VV>,​EV>
    The class LabelPropagation discovers communities in a graph, by iteratively propagating labels between neighbors.
    LabelPropagation.LabelPropagationMessenger<K,​VV extends Comparable<VV>>
    send the vertex label to all out-neighbors
    LabelPropagation.LabelPropagationUpdater<K,​VV extends Comparable<VV>>
    compute the value of a vertex by adopting the most frequent label among its in-neighbors
    LocalClusterCoefficient<K extends Comparable<K> & org.apache.flink.types.CopyableValue<K>,​VV,​EV>
    The class LocalClusterCoefficient measures the connectedness of each vertex's neighborhood.
    Louvain<K>
    The class Louvain compute the community id of each vertex by greedily optimizing the modularity of communities.
    Louvain.InitialVertexMapper<K>
    initial the vertex to (communityId, vertexWeight)
    Louvain.LouvainMessenger<K>
    distributes the commID and edge weight to neighbors
    Louvain.LouvainUpdater<K>
    update the community ID of every vertex to the one that maximize the gain of modularity
    Louvain.OutputVertexMapper<K>
    return the communityIe as the value of vertex

    TriangleCounting<K extends Comparable<K>,​VV,​EV>
    The class TriangleCounting enumerates unique triangles present in the input graph.
    TriangleListing<K extends Comparable<K>,​VV,​EV>
    The class TriangleListing enumerates unique triangles present in the input graph.
    WeaklyConnectedComponents<K,​VV,​EV>
    The class WeaklyConnectedComponents computes weakly connected components and converges when no vertex updates its component ID or when the maximum number of iterations has been reached.
    WeaklyConnectedComponents.WCCMessenger<K,​VV extends Comparable<VV>>
    send the current vertex value to all adjacent vertices
    WeaklyConnectedComponents.WCCUpdater<K,​VV extends Comparable<VV>>
    update the value of a vertex by picking the minimum neighbor value out of all the incoming messages
